Hello! My name is Ajinkya Ranade. I currently work as JSPS postdoctoral fellow at [Institute of Science Tokyo](https://www.titech.ac.jp/english), Japan. My research focuses on innovating efficient, sustainable and fit-for-purpose water treatment technologies for water recycling and energy conservation.
